mapper.insert: insert into PetHotelReservation (phr_num, c_num,p_num, ph_num, phr_chkin, phr_chkout) values (pethotelreservation_seq.nextval, #{c_num}, #{p_num}, #{ph_num}, #{phr_chkin}, #{phr_chkout} )
mapper.update: update PetHotelReservation set phr_chekin=#{phr_chkin}, phr_chekout=#{phr_chkout}, where phr_num = #{phr_num}
mapper.select: select * from PetHotelReservation where p_num = #{p_num} and #{phr_chkin} between phr_chkin and phr_chkout-1 and #{phr_chkout} between phr_chkin and phr_chkout
